```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
AllData <- read.csv("../Data/EggCountsD1D7_R1R7.2.csv")
AllData <- AllData %>% filter(Condition != "WT")
```

```{r}
AllData_1 <- AllData %>% filter(Day == "D1")
attach(AllData_1)
pairwise.t.test(EggCount, Condition, p.adj = "bonf")
detach(AllData_1)
```
